whitelisting.name: global.whitelistid
whitelisting.description: Adds the given Player ID (In-game name) to the Whitelist. Has no function if Whitelist is Disabled.
whitelisting.effect: User 2StageFright will be able to access the server when the whitelist is active.

whitelisting.name: global.removewhitelist
whitelisting.description: Removes the given Player ID (In-game name) from the Whitelist.
